lyrics.text: Is so loud…. (but) in a perfect way
It is beautiful… and that’s what (we) asked for
It made me writing for a goodbye
A goodbye where a bigger encounter is within
And not simply a goodbye that has an encounter
Can also create a stronger connection
To create a life between two
And they will get along … they will agree even for being different
And being different is something normal for souls
And asking for nothing but love
And beautiful in a perfect way
و مش بس الوداع جوّاه لقا
يخلِّي حياه تِخلَق ما بين اتنين
It's time to tell you Jessica's story
Jessica is a wonderful and pretty girl. Who doesn't love Jessica?
One month before our wedding since we've known Jessica
I can't blame you, darling. Who doesn't love Jessica?
God protect you, Jessica.. God protect you, Jessica
God protect you, Jessica.. God protect you, Jessica
My lover kept swearing and saying that he doesn't love Jessica
He needs time to think about staying away from Jessica
Though night and day, day and night, he's coming and going with Jessica
And when barely talks to me, he's talking about Jessica
I can't blame you, darling. I've fallen in love with Jessica
God protect you, Jessica.. God protect you, Jessica
God protect you, Jessica.. God protect you, Jessica
جه الوقت اللي هحكيلكوا عن حكاية «جيسيكا»
«جيسكا» دي بنت جميلة فظيعة دة مين ميحبش «جيسيكا»
قبل فرحنا بشهر واحد يوم ما عرفنا «جيسيكا»
مقدرش ألومك يا حبيبي ده مين ميحبش «جيسيكا»
حبيبي فضل يحلف ويقول إنه مبيحبش «جيسيكا»
محتاج يا عيني وقت يفكر يبقى بعيد عن «جيسيكا»
ما هو ليل وصبح و صبح وليل داخل خارج مع «جيسيكا»
ويادوبك حتى اما يكملني يحكيلي عن «جيسيكا»
مقدرش ألومك يا حبيبي عن نفسي حبيت «جيسيكا»
Oh my heart, don't get sad
And don't chase the suppressed noise
Oh my heart, don't stay up out of loneliness
Oh so many [beautiful] eyes have loomed
Oh my heart, don't grow callous
Oh, my heart is always impatient and one step ahead of me
And this is what brings me misery
the reason for my happy moments
Oh my heart, don't be patient
And don't listen to what I say...
Oh my heart, don't get sad
Oh my heart, don't get sad
Oh my heart, don't be silent
Go on with me till the end
Oh my heart, don't get bored
between a moment and the other
Oh my heart, don't get silent
Go on with me till the end
Oh my heart, don't get bored
between a moment and the other
which of the two moments was tender.
And which moment will remain with you
Oh my heart, don't cry upon what's gone
Oh my heart, don't rush running to the future
Oh my heart don't listen to what I say
Don't listen to what I say...
Oh my heart, don't get sad
Oh my heart, don't get sad

englishTranslations.title: Don't Listen to What I Say

lyrics.text: ولا تجري ورا الدوشة اللي مخنوقة
یا قلبي لا تسهر من الوحدة
ده كام من مرة طلت عین
یا قلب سابقني دایماً و مش صابر
با أنهي لحظة في الاتنین كانت حانیة
یا قلبي لاتبكي على اللي راح
یا قلبي لا تجري على اللي جاي

songs.title: La Tesmaa' Kalami [Live Version] (لا تسمع كلامي)

lyrics.text: There is no moon far up high that I can’t reach
I am the one that I left nothing I didn’t try
There is no dream that I ever dreamt and I didn’t live
I believed my voice, I fixed my mistake, I knew my fault and I didn’t hide it
I cut a word to myself that I will never feel afraid of what people might choose
And let everyone asking where I’m going and I asked no one back
There is no moon far up high that I can’t reach
I am the one that I left nothing I didn’t try
There is no moon far up high that I can’t reach
I am the one that I left nothing I didn’t try
«مفیش قمر» قمر بعید عالي عليا وما بطولهوش
أنا اللي بقیت ولا خلیت شئ واحد وما جربتوش
صدقت صوتي صالحت غلطي عرفت عیبي ماخبیتهوش
عاهدت نفسي إني ما اخافشي من اختیار الناس ما تقبلوش
وسبت الكون یسألني رایحة فین ولا اسألهوش
“مافیش قمر” قمر بعید عالي عليا وما بطولهوش
انا اللي بقیت ولا خلیت شئ واحد وما جربتوش
(ما فیش قمر) قمر بعید عالي عليا وما بطولهوش
انا اللي بقیت ولا خلیت شئ واحد وما جربتوش
I agree that we've got something in common
I agree that we've got something in common
But that common thing bears the scent of separation
But that common thing bears the scent of separation
The path of meditation is a contrast of emotions
The path of meditation is a contrast of emotions
These times don't understand us, or it's simply stupidity
These times don't understand us, or it's simply stupidity
But there's something common between us, perhaps there is
Yes there is! It's something that bears the scent of separation
معاك إن حاجة بتجمع ما بينا
زمن مش فاهمنا أو مجرد غباء
زمن مش فاهمنا او مجرد غباء
لكن بينا حاجة جايز بينا حاجه
Life is bigger than the room
The one I don’t know how to leave
And it’s up to me tonight (to choose) to forgive
Or to cut a word to myself to never step in it (again)
Life is braver than the man
That I wish to see sometimes
But this one is one of the impossible things
And needs a well prepared plan
Life is bigger, life is prettier
Life is more wonderful, life is wider
Life is bigger, life is prettier
Life is faster, life is wider
Life has got to have and have
Life has got to have what’s already enough
But I swore that I’m going to rule it
With my mind, and to keep my word
But I swore that I’m going to rule it
With my mind, and to keep my word
Life is simpler than hours being wasted
While thinking how will my cloths hide me
Life is wiser than the one who can flirt on me
(Wiser) than the one who can’t look straight to my eyes
Life is more complicated than whom I’ve seen,
And where did he saw me, or what others think about me
Life is more complicated than whom I’ve seen,
And where did he saw me, or what others think about me
Life is bigger, life is prettier
Life is more wonderful, life is wider
Life is bigger, life is prettier
Life is faster, life is wider
Life has got to have and have
Life has got to have what’s already enough
Life is longer than the hour when I should get back home
Life is more important than to prove to you
Life is shorter than to explain to you
Life has got to have and have
Life has got to have what’s already enough
الدنيا اعقل من اللي قادر انه يعاكسني
من اللي ميقدرش يبص في عيني
وشافني فين واللي فاهمينه عني التانين
وَشافِنِييَ فَيِن وَاللَيّ فاكرينه عَنِّي التانين
الدنيا اطول من الساعة اللي لازم اروح فيها
in front of the wall , in front of who build it
in front of the wall, in front of who raised it
in front of the wall, in front of who build it
in front of the wall, in front of who raised it
aslo in front of whose protect it
aslo in front of whose protect it
a poor man stand and made bee
a poor man stand and made bee
on the wall , on who build it , on who raised it and on whose protect it
on the wall and on who build it the man made pee
aslo in front of whose protect it
aslo in front of whose protect it
a poor man stand and made bee
a poor man stand and made bee
on the wall , on who build it , on who raised it and on whose protect it
on the wall , on who build it , on who raised it and on whose protect it
on the wall , on who build it , on who raised it and on whose protect it
on the wall and on who build it the man made pee
“ас-су:р вильли: бэни: вильли: м"альли: вильли: бъяхми:
“ас-су:р вильли: бэни: вильли: м"альли: вильли: бъяхми:
“ас-су:р вильли: бэни: вильли: м"альли: вильли: бъяхми:
“ас-су:р вильли: бэни: вильли: м"альли: вильли: бъяхми:
عالسور واللي بانيه واللي معليه واللي بيحميه
عالسور واللي بانيه الراجل عمل پیپی
عالسور واللي بانيه واللي معليه واللي بيحميه
عالسور واللي بانيه واللي معليه واللي بيحميه
عالسور واللي بانيه واللي معليه واللي بيحميه
عالسور واللي بانيه الراجل عمل پیپی
What else can he say to me?
Would he tell me to be happy
when I see my flag leaving its mark upon the sky
Hanging upon the mast of a ship
A ship that's drifting in the water of an afflicted Nile..
What else is left to make one happy?
When I find my flag leaving its mark upon the road
or even on the windowsill of a president
And why does the wind cause it to flap?
It is a wind that is a remnant of nationalism
that cools my heart with a breeze bit by bit
I am still capable of loving my country
I have not forgotten its strong soil
I am firmly planted in it
And it is firmly planted in me
It is true that I still get surprised
سفينة سابحة في مية نيل عليل
what matters is that you find yourself truly happy
what matters is that you know you've made a good decision
what matters is that you find yourself really happy
what matters is that you find me insignificant
what matters is that anything else
مهم تكون لقيت نفسك حقيقي سعيد
مهم تكون عرفت إنه قرار سليم
مهم تكون لقيت نفسك بجد سعيد
مهم تكون لقيتني مش فارقة كتير
throngs, misery and pounds of fat
but it's all good, but it's all good
if the metro still has stylish girls
boredom, laziness and the couch is a sticky couch
an old fan, old and crooked
but it's all good, but it's all good
if the house still has a high balcony
we're alone in our jobs, papers here and here and here
and who has send, who has lost, and who has found
but it's all good, but it's all good
if a lover came out from the closets
and said "why don't we get out?"
بس كله يهون بس كله يهون
اذا لسه فيه المترو بنات متزوقة
بس كله يهون بس كله يهون
اذا بس فيه في البيت بلكونة محندقة
لوحدنا في شغلنا ورق هنا وهنا وهنا
مكتب كئيب منعكش ولا حتة مروقة
ومين بعت ومين ضيع ومين لقى
بس كله يهون بس كله يهون
اذا ظهرلي حبيب من جوة جوة الدواليب
having breakfast and tea with milk
Four hands and four lips having breakfast
and embracing the light of day
They embrace the love that unites them together
And they embrace the sun that shakes the curtains
It paints itself upon the floor of the room
Upon the carpet they bought with their marriage furniture
Upon the love that they bought without a price
Upon the carpet they bought with their marriage furniture
Upon the love that they bought without a price
They drink tea with milk in two cups
during breakfast, four hands and two rings
They wake my heart up every night
And they write in a bright pistachio green color
They write in a bright pistachio green color
أربع إیدین وأربع شفایف على الفطار
في الأوضة ترسم نفسها على أرضها
على البساط اللى اشتروه مع الجهاز
على الغرام اللى اشتروه من غیر تمن
على البساط اللى اشتروه مع الجهاز
على الغرام اللى اشتروه من غیر تمن
بیصحوا قلبى كل لیلة فى المنام
if I were a stranger to this town
I would've felt that the traffic.. is an energy
you tell a myth.. it becomes truth
I'm wondering if coming back to my town
would bring me happiness.. and a peace of mind
neighbourhoods that I know each step of
and I know each one of the people there
my perfume which stands out among thousands of them
and among them, safety is a different kind of safety
and being away from them has a different kind of safety
If I were a stranger to this town
I'm a stranger to this town
لو كنت غريب عن دي المدينة
عطري اللي محسوب ع الألوف منهم
و ف وسطهم نوع الأمان غير نوع أمان
و البعد عنهم فيه أمان غير الأمان
ان كنت غريب عن دي المدينة
There are people playing football on the street
and people walking, singing and taking photos on the street
there are people cursing each other
there are people sleeping on the street
there are people selling their bodies
there are people sleeping on the street
but it's gonna be a scandal indeed
but it's gonna be a scandal indeed
yes, it's gonna be a scandal indeed
yes, it's gonna be a scandal indeed
if we forgot and kissed each other on the street
في ناس بتلعب كورة في الشارع
و ناس تمشي بتغنّي تاخد صورة في الشارع
لو نسينا و بُسنا بعض في الشارع
I lost my notebook an hour ago,
I lost my notebook an hour ago,
the one that was full of lines,
Words that were important to me
Words that were important to me
And I remembered that life is about lost things
had taken another path in its way
Then was I the one who chose
or was its abandonment forced upon me?
was I scared to lose it?
Why didn't I hug it when I went out today,
tightly? Why didn't I give it a bit of tenderness,
draw it close to my heartbeat,
and give it a bit of tenderness..?
because it felt that I neglected it
I've been tearing pages off it since a couple of days
It seems that, without meaning to be cruel,
Even if necessity is responsible for this..
ولا انا اللي مجبور على هجره؟
ليه النهاردة وانا نازل ما حضنتهوش
باينني من غير ما اقصد القسوة
We'll all fall asleep at night
We'll all fall asleep at night
And movies, addicted to loneliness before sleep
Addicted to watching the display windows of shops
Addicted to brands and to people
And we walk on the street towards home
afraid of home and of the windows
They left a neon lamp out there on the streets
for the sake of those who are not asleep
And those who can't sleep are on a bunch of beds
They counted how many mobile phones
and how many TV's are there
They counted how many missed calls they have
And how many friends are actually on the contact list
They counted their friends who remain
And counted how many locks are on their doors
We'll all fall asleep at night
We'll all fall asleep at night
And suddenly we'll see the morning through the window
And out of exhaustion we'll wake up forgetting [everything]

englishTranslations.title: We'll All Fall Asleep at Night

lyrics.text: و الأفلام مدمنین الوحشة قبل النوم
واللي مش نایمین على كام سریر
I’ll take a few things with me while I’m leaving
I’ll take a puff of a cigarette, a cup of coffee and music
I’ll take a few things with me while I’m leaving
I’ll take a puff of a cigarette, a cup of coffee and music
A cigarette, an ashtray, a puff coming in and another one out
An idea (forming above like) a cloud in the inside and outside
And I’m holding to that idea and refusing all the others
Not asking for what might tomorrow bring, I can’t leave the past
I’ll take a few things with me while I’m leaving
I’ll take a few things with me while I’m leaving
A paper and a pen, a dream and pain, empty drawn lines
I’ll take with me a friend; I’ll take my lover with me
I’ll take the first road my city came to know me in
I’ll take with me fire; I’ll take water with me
I’ll take with me clay; I’ll take a yearning smell
I’ll take air which we could breathe together
هاخد نفس سیجارة فنجان قهوة و مزیكا
حاخد معایا كام حاجة «و انا ماشي»
حاخد نفس سیجارة فنجان قهوة و مزیكا
سیجارة و طفایة نفس داخل نفس خارج
سحابة فكرة في الداخل وفي الخارج
ولا ماسك في دي الفكرة ولا على غیرها انا موافق
ولا بسأل فیه إیه بكرة ولا للماضي أنا مفارق
هاخد معایا كام حاجة (و أنا ماشي)
ورقة و قلم حلم و ألم سطور فاضیة و مرسومة
حاخد معایا صدیق حاخد معایا حبیبتي
هاخد أول طریق عرفتني فیه مدینتي
حاخد معایا نار حاخد معایا میة
حاخد معایا طین هاخد ریحة الحنین
